RelatedSentence: At a special meeting Monday , County Manager Chuck Abernathy gave the County Commission a proposed $ 38.4 million budget for 2014-2015 that does n't call for a property tax rate hike .
At a special meeting Monday , County Manager Chuck Abernathy gave the County Commission a proposed $ 38.4 million budget for 2014-2015 that does n't call for a property tax rate hike .
The proposed county budget for next fiscal year contains more money for the school system and McDowell Technical Community College .

A0: The proposed county budget for next fiscal year
RelatedSentence: And like in previous years , the proposed budget contains a 2.5 percent pay increase for county employees .
